'''Portrait of Heroic Might''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Portrait of Heroic Might is obtainable from a Remarkable Chest in [[Natlan]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in {{Location|Ancient Sacred Mountain}} after defeating a {{Enemy|Secret Source Automaton: Hunter-Seeker}}.
